application.services

Class Firebase

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.services.Firebase

  • public class Firebase
extends java.lang.Object
    Purpose:
    Connect the program to its Firebase database.
    Description:
    Contains methods for retrieving information from
    Firebase, and for creating, deleting and updating the
    Users, Films, Screenings and Bookings in the Firebase
    database.
    Version:
    $Date: 2017/12/14 16:00:00 $
    Author:
    Zaid Al Lahham and Aleksi Anttila
